## Preview

Data manipulation and querying is a very useful skill. 

An equally important one is being able to visualize the data.

In this lecture, you will learn a handful of recipes to draw plots using `ggplot`

In particular, you will learn about:

- Bar plots
- Histograms
- Box plots ("Box-and-Whisker" plots)
- Scatterplots (and how to add a best fit line)
